CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(text(b3o__Status__c)) || ISPICKVAL(b3o__Status__c, 'In Review') ,HYPERLINK("/apex/b3o__ApplicationStageManager?id=" & Id, IMAGE("/img/samples/light_yellow.gif", " ")), IF(ISPICKVAL(b3o__Status__c, 'Accepted') ,HYPERLINK("/apex/b3o__ApplicationStageManager?id=" & Id, IMAGE("/img/samples/light_green.gif", " ")), IF(ISPICKVAL(b3o__Status__c, 'Rejected') ,IMAGE("/img/samples/light_red.gif", " "), "")))
CustomField.label: Progress
